title: Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin plans to build 5,400-satellite megaconstellation
description: Blue Origin just announced "TeraWave," a planned satellite megaconstellation designed for customers who need super-high-throughput communication services.
content: Blue Origin just announced "TeraWave," a planned satellite megaconstellation designed for customers who need super-high-throughput communication services.
